CompilerOptions.description: A map with keys specifying compiler options and values specifying the option setting. See https://docs.nestjs.com/cli/monorepo#global-compiler-options for details

tsConfigPath.description: (monorepo only) Points at the file containing the tsconfig.json settings that will be used when nest build or nest start is called without a project option (e.g., when the default project is built or started). 'nest build' will not work as expected without this file.

webpack.description: If true, use webpack compiler. If false or not present, use tsc. In monorepo mode, the default is true (use webpack), in standard mode, the default is false (use tsc). See https://docs.nestjs.com/cli/monorepo#cli-properties for details.

webpackConfigPath.description: Points at a webpack options file. If not specified, Nest looks for the file webpack.config.js.

assets.description: Enables automatically distributing non-TypeScript assets whenever a compilation step begins (asset distribution does not happen on incremental compiles in --watch mode). Accept glob-like string and object. See https://docs.nestjs.com/cli/monorepo#assets for details.

watchAssets.description: If true, run in watch-mode, watching all non-TypeScript assets. Setting watchAssets in a top-level compilerOptions property overrides any watchAssets settings within the assets property.

deleteOutDir.description: If true, whenever the compiler is invoked, it will first remove the compilation output directory (as configured in tsconfig.json, where the default is ./dist).

AssetsOptions.description: For finer control, the element can be object.

include.description: Glob-like file specifications for the assets to be distributed.

exclude.description: Glob-like file specifications for the assets to be excluded from the include list.

outDir.description: A string specifying the path (relative to the root folder) where the assets should be distributed. Defaults to the same output directory configured for compiler output.

watchAssets.description: If true, run in watch mode watching specified assets. Setting watchAssets in a top-level compilerOptions property overrides any watchAssets settings within the assets property.

GenerateOptions.description: A map with keys specifying global generate options and values specifying the option setting. See https://docs.nestjs.com/cli/monorepo#global-generate-options for details

GenerateSpecOptions.description: If the value is boolean, a value of true enables spec generation by default and a value of false disables it. A flag passed on the CLI command line overrides this setting, as does a project-specific generateOptions setting (more below). If the value is an object, each key represents a schematic name, and the boolean value determines whether the default spec generation is enabled / disabled for that specific schematic. See https://docs.nestjs.com/cli/monorepo#global-generate-options for details.

application.description: Generate spec file for application schematics or not.

class.description: Disable spec file generation for class schematics.

configuration.description: Generate spec file for configuration schematics or not.

controller.description: Generate spec file for controller schematics or not.

decorator.description: Generate spec file for decorator schematics or not.

filter.description: Generate spec file for filter schematics or not.

gateway.description: Generate spec file for gateway schematics or not.

guard.description: Generate spec file for guard schematics or not.

interceptor.description: Generate spec file for interceptor schematics or not.

interface.description: Generate spec file for interface schematics or not.

middleware.description: Generate spec file for middleware schematics or not.

module.description: Generate spec file for module schematics or not.

pipe.description: Generate spec file for pipe schematics or not.

provider.description: Generate spec file for provider schematics or not.

resolver.description: Generate spec file for resolver schematics or not.

service.description: Generate spec file for service schematics or not.

library.description: Generate spec file for library schematics or not.

sub-app.description: Generate spec file for sub-app schematics or not.

resource.description: Generate spec file for resource schematics or not.

name.description: The npm package name of the cli plugin, eg @nestjs/swagger.

introspectComments.description: If set to true, plugin will generate descriptions and example values for properties based on comments.

typeFileNameSuffix.description: (GraphQL Only) GraphQL types files suffix. Default value: ['.input.ts', '.args.ts', '.entity.ts', '.model.ts']. See https://docs.nestjs.com/graphql/cli-plugin#using-the-cli-plugin for details.

dtoFileNameSuffix.description: (Swagger Only) DTO (Data Transfer Object) files suffix. Default value: ['.dto.ts', '.entity.ts']. See https://docs.nestjs.com/openapi/cli-plugin#using-the-cli-plugin for details

controllerFileNameSuffix.description: (Swagger Only) Controller files suffix. See https://docs.nestjs.com/openapi/cli-plugin#using-the-cli-plugin for details

classValidatorShim.description: (Swagger Only) If set to true, the module will reuse class-validator validation decorators (e.g. @Max(10) will add max: 10 to schema definition). See https://docs.nestjs.com/openapi/cli-plugin#using-the-cli-plugin for details

dtoKeyOfComment.description: (Swagger Only) The property key to set the comment text to on ApiProperty. See https://docs.nestjs.com/openapi/cli-plugin#using-the-cli-plugin for details

controllerKeyOfComment.description: (Swagger Only) The property key to set the comment text to on ApiOperation. See https://docs.nestjs.com/openapi/cli-plugin#using-the-cli-plugin for details

collection.description: Points at the collection of schematics used to generate components. you generally should not change this value.

sourceRoot.description: Points at the root of the source code for the single project in standard mode structures, or the default project in monorepo mode structures.

entryFile.description: The entry file where 'nest start' work with. Default to 'main'.

monorepo.description: (monorepo only) For a monorepo mode structure, this value is always true.

root.description: (monorepo only) Points at the project root of the default project.
